catalyst: The text mentions several cocatalysts (Ag, Cu2O, Pd, Au, Pt) loaded on the surface of HST to enhance photocatalytic activity, but it doesn't explicitly state a single "catalyst" used in the experiment. It focuses on the role of cocatalysts in promoting the separation of photoinduced electrons and holes.
co_catalyst: The co-catalysts used in the experiment are Pt and Pd.
